field.name: summary
field.value: When using more than one session inside transaction, only first session is registered in NH transaction context

field.name: description
field.value:
Only sessions to first database are enlisted in active transaction's "nh.session.enlisted" context. Opening session to another database in the same transaction performs only partial enlistment - session.BeginTransaction is called for underlaying NH session but session delegate is not added to context, so opening another compatible session for second database runs session.BeginTransaction again (on the same NH session) and this in many cases means throwing exception (parallel transactions not supported....)
Attached patch : - includes test case SessionManagerTestCase.SecondDatabaseSessionEnlistedOnlyOnceInActualTransaction - resolves bug (DefaultSessionManager.EnlistIfNecessary) - adds VS2005 project file for Test project - fixes obsoleted reference to Castle.Model.dll to Castle.Core.dll - adds R# options file for solution (using global options file)
